verses.text: \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, Thou hast been favourable \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1121"\w* land: thou hast brought back \w the|strong="H1121"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jacob.

\w Thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast forgiven \w the|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* people, \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* hast covered \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sin. \qs Selah\qs*

Thou hast \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H5375"\w* wrath: thou hast turned \add thyself \add*\w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fierceness \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w thine|strong="H5375"\w* \w anger|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w cause|strong="H7725"\w* \w thine|strong="H7725"\w* indignation \w toward|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w cease|strong="H7725"\w*.

Wilt \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w angry|strong="H3708"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H5973"\w* \w ever|strong="H7725"\w*? wilt \w thou|strong="H7725"\w* \w draw|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H7725"\w* \w thine|strong="H7725"\w* \w anger|strong="H3708"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* generations?
Wilt thou not quicken us again: \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w thy|strong="H4900"\w* people \w may|strong="H1755"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H1755"\w* thee?

Shew \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* mercy, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* grant \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* salvation.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* speak: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* speak peace \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* saints: \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* again \w to|strong="H3068"\w* folly.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* salvation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* nigh \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7725"\w*; \w that|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w may|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* land.
Mercy \w and|strong="H3519"\w* truth \w are|strong="H7138"\w* met together; righteousness \w and|strong="H3519"\w* peace \w have|strong="H7138"\w* kissed each other.
Truth springeth out \w of|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H7965"\w* earth; \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* hath looked down \w from|strong="H7965"\w* heaven.

Yea, \w the|strong="H8064"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H8064"\w* give \w that|strong="H8064"\w* which \w is|strong="H6664"\w* good; \w and|strong="H8064"\w* our \w land|strong="H8064"\w* \w shall|strong="H8064"\w* yield her increase.

Righteousness \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* before \w him|strong="H5414"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* footsteps \w a|strong="H3068"\w* way \add to walk in\add*.
